name: La Calaca
description:
After awaking after a precarious situation, you find yourself in a strange plaza with evil lurking everywhere. 

This is an entry into the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022  Worked on by "Funny Monkey Studios" and  "SnoBunni"

Bomb Key: B
Movement: WASD
Shooting: Left Mouse Button
Aim: Right Mouse Button
Look: Mouse Movement
